name: Artificer Armour
rule: The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+ and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

name: The Honour Vehement
rule: Add +1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer's melee weapons. If the Assault Doctrine is active for the bearer's unit, add +2 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics instead.

name: Adept of the Codex
rule: Once per turn, you can declare that the Tactical Doctrine is active for the bearer's unit, even if another Doctrine is active for your army. This effect lasts until the end of the phase.

name: Fire Discipline
rule: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer's unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If the Devastator Doctrine is active for the bearer's unit, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.

name: Indomitable Fury
rule: The first time the bearer is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield with its full wounds remaining, as close as possible to its previous position and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models.

name: Stoic Defender
rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability while they are within range of an objective marker you control. If that unit becomes Battle-shocked, halve the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit instead of changing it to 0.

name: Architect of War
rule: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer's unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

name: Target Augury Web
rule: In your Command phase, select one friendly Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model within 6" of the bearer. Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by that model have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

name: The Flesh is Weak
rule: The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

name: Adept of the Omnissiah
rule: Once per battle round, when a saving throw is failed for a friendly Vehicle model within 6" of the bearer, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

name: Master of Machine War
rule: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly Vehicle model within 6" of the bearer. That model is eligible to shoot this turn even if it Advanced or Fell Back.

name: Champion of Humanity
rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit can ignore any or all modifiers to their characteristics and to any roll or test made for them (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

name: War-tempered Artifice
rule: Add 3 to the Strength characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons.

name: Forged in Battle
rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, once per turn, after making a Hit roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, you can change the result of that roll to an unmodified 6.

name: Adamantine Mantle
rule: Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack. If that attack was made with a Melta or Torrent weapon, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1 instead.

name: Fury of the Storm
rule: Add 1 to the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer's melee weapons. If the bearer's unit made a Charge move this turn, add 2 to those characteristics instead.

name: Portents of Wisdom
rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.

name: Feinting Withdrawal
rule: The bearer's unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

name: Hunter’s Instincts
rule: When setting up the bearer's unit from Strategic Reserves, you can treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

name: The Blade Driven Deep
rule: The bearer's unit gains the Infiltrators ability.

name: Ghostweave Cloak
rule: The bearer has the Stealth and Lone Operative abilities.

name: Execute and Redeploy
rule: After the bearer's unit has shot, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, it is not eligible to declare a charge this turn.

name: Shadow War Veteran
rule: Each time an opponent targets the bearer's unit with a Stratagem, increase the CP cost of that Stratagem by 1 for that activation.

name: The Imperium’s Sword
rule: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer's melee weapons. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, you can select one friendly Adeptus Astartes unit within 12" of the bearer; until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit.

name: Fear Made Manifest
rule: Each time an enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) fails a Battle-shock test while it is within 6" of the bearer, one model in that enemy unit is destroyed. Once per battle, you can have D3 models destroyed instead.

name: Rites of War
rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of the bearer. Once per battle, at the start of your Command phase, you can select one friendly Adeptus Astartes unit within 12" of the bearer; until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that selected unit.

name: Iron Resolve
rule: The bearer has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. Once per battle, after an attack has been allocated to a model in the bearer's unit, you can declare that the unit has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability for the rest of the phase.

name: Blackwing Shroud
rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Infiltrators ability.

name: Coronal Susurrant
rule: Each time your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem, if that unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

name: Umbral Raptor
rule: The bearer has the Stealth and Lone Operative abilities.

name: Hunter’s Instincts
rule: If the bearer’s unit is in Strategic Reserves, for the purposes of setting up that unit on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

name: Champion Of The Feast
rule: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by other models in the bearer’s unit as well.

name: Disciple Of Rhetoricus
rule: Improve the Objective Control characteristic of the bearer by 1. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of other models in the bearer’s unit as well.

name: Indomitable Champion
rule: The first time the bearer is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with 3 wounds remaining.

name: Malodraxian Standard
rule: Each time an attack targets the bearer’s unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of the bearer’s unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

name: Immolator
rule: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristics of Torrent weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit.

name: War‑Tempered Artifice
rule: Add 3 to the Strength characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons.

name: Forged In Battle
rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, once per turn, after making a Hit roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, you can change the result of that roll to an unmodified 6.

name: Adamantine Mantle
rule: Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack. If that attack was made with a Melta or Torrent weapon, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1 instead.

name: Speed of the Primarch
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in the bearer's unit have the Fights First ability.

name: Rage-fuelled Warrior
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, the bearers melee weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 3] ability.

name: Icon of the Angel
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) within Engagement Range of the bearer's unit is selected to Fall Back, models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

name: Gift of Foresight
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Once per battle round, just after making a Hit roll, a Wound roll or a saving throw for the bearer, you can treat the result as an unmodified roll of 6 instead.

name: Shroud of Heroes
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The first time the bearer is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with 3 wounds remaining (if the bearer was Battle-shocked when it was destroyed, it is instead returned with its full wounds remaining).

name: Stubborn Tenacity
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Battle-shocked and below its Starting Strength.

name: Weapons of the First Legion
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks, Strength and Damage characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons. While the bearer is Battle-shocked, add 2 to the Attacks, Strength and Damage characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons instead.

name: Pennant of Remembrance
rule: ANCIENT model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. While that unit is Battle-shocked, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

name: Swift Hunter
rule: SPACE WOLVES model only. Models in the bearer’s unit have the Scouts 7" ability.

name: Fenrisian Grit
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

name: Wolf Master
rule: SPACE WOLVES model only. In your Command phase, select one friendly SPACE WOLVES unit within 9" of the bearer. Until the start of your next Command phase, teeth and claws and Tyrnak and Fenrir weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

name: Feral Rage
rule: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer. Each time the bearer ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, add an additional 1 to the Attacks characteristic of those weapons.
